entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:31 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 9:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: E 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle mixed with freezing drizzle. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle changing to a few flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
